## Conditional statements

```{r}
temperature <- 95

if (temperature > 97) {
  print("Temperature warning")
}else 
  print("Temperature is within the norm")
```

### Swith statements

```{r}
housing_type <- "whole"
switch(housing_type, 
       "single" = print("400"),
       "double" = print("750"),
       "whole" = print("1100"))
```
